reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Education project by national languages

description.narrative: Pre-school program in sereer , techer's training, producing teaching materials, litterature, dictionary in sereer in collaboration with the university of Dakar, literacy classes for women in pulaar and advocacy for official school programs in mother tongue . The learning results improve with mother tongue program, mostly women in litteracy classes and their livelihood and participation in decision making improve. Production of teaching materials and litterature in local languages rise the appreciation of nat ional languages and support the litteracy work. Advocacy work streghten the approache of school program in mother tongue. The beneficiers are in rural areas where learning results are weak and about 50% of women are illiterates. Our partner is Lutheran Chu rch of Senegal who has a long experience of litteracy work and grassroot contact with the population of rural areas.
